Description: Clay spindle-whorl; truncated conical bodical with a slightly chamfered underside; central vertical piercing; possible traces of wear on both lips.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Horatio Herbert Kitchener, Earl Kitchener of Khartoum
Curator's comments: See Bailey, Op. Ath. VI (1965), pp. 5-13 for details of the Hake-Kitchener excavations at Koution.
Acquisition name: Transferred from: Victoria and Albert Museum
